st2AgentCopyright.name: st2AgentCopyright
st2AgentCopyright.description: provider of (company which wrote) the ST-II agent code, code release info and copyright info

st2ProtoVersion.name: st2ProtoVersion
st2ProtoVersion.description: version of ST-II running; RFC-1190 for starters

st2FlowSpecVersion.name: st2FlowSpecVersion
st2FlowSpecVersion.description: registered version number of Flow Spec

st2AgentType.name: st2AgentType
st2AgentType.description: whether this system performs ST-II end-system or intermediate-system functions or both

st2RoutingDerived.name: st2RoutingDerived
st2RoutingDerived.description: where does ST-II get routes from, whether IP routing tables or some other means

st2ToAccept.name: st2ToAccept
st2ToAccept.description: Initial hop-by-hop timeout for acknowledgment of ACCEPT

st2NAccept.name: st2NAccept
st2NAccept.description: number of ACCEPT retries before returning a failure

st2ToConnect.name: st2ToConnect
st2ToConnect.description: Initial hop-by-hop timeout for acknowledgment of CONNECT

st2NConnect.name: st2NConnect
st2NConnect.description: number of CONNECT retries before returning a failure

st2ToDisconnect.name: st2ToDisconnect
st2ToDisconnect.description: Initial hop-by-hop timeout for acknowledgment of DISCONNECT

st2NDisconnect.name: st2NDisconnect
st2NDisconnect.description: number of DISCONNECT retries before returning a failure

st2ToHidAck.name: st2ToHidAck
st2ToHidAck.description: Initial hop-by-hop timeout for acknowledgment of HID-CHANGE-REQUEST

st2NHidAck.name: st2NHidAck
st2NHidAck.description: number of HID-CHANGE-REQUEST retries before returning a failure

st2ToHidChange.name: st2ToHidChange
st2ToHidChange.description: Initial hop-by-hop timeout for acknowledgment of HID-CHANGE

st2NHidChange.name: st2NHidChange
st2NHidChange.description: number of HID-CHANGE retries before returning a failure

st2ToNotify.name: st2ToNotify
st2ToNotify.description: Initial hop-by-hop timeout for acknowledgment of NOTIFY

st2NNotify.name: st2NNotify
st2NNotify.description: number of NOTIFY retries before returning a failure

st2ToRefuse.name: st2ToRefuse
st2ToRefuse.description: Initial hop-by-hop timeout for acknowledgment of REFUSE

st2NRefuse.name: st2NRefuse
st2NRefuse.description: number of REFUSE retries before returning a failure

st2ToReroute.name: st2ToReroute
st2ToReroute.description: Timeout for receipt of ACCEPT or REFUSE from targets during failure recovery, allowing intermediate systems time to try recovery

st2NReroute.name: st2NReroute
st2NReroute.description: number of CONNECT retries before returning a failure from targets

st2ToEnd2End.name: st2ToEnd2End
st2ToEnd2End.description: End-to-end timeout for receipt of ACCEPT or REFUSE from targets by origin during failure recovery, allowing intermediate systems time to try recovery

st2NEnd2End.name: st2NEnd2End
st2NEnd2End.description: number of CONNECT retries before origin returns a failure from targets

st2NHidAbort.name: st2NHidAbort
st2NHidAbort.description: Number of rejected HID proposals before aborting the HID negotiation process

st2HelloTimerHoldDown.name: st2HelloTimerHoldDown
st2HelloTimerHoldDown.description: Interval that Restarted bit must be set after ST Agent restart

st2HelloLossFactor.name: st2HelloLossFactor
st2HelloLossFactor.description: Number of consecutively missed HELLO messages before declaring link failure to neighbor

st2DefaultRecoveryTimeout.name: st2DefaultRecoveryTimeout
st2DefaultRecoveryTimeout.description: Default for interval between successive HELLOs to/from active neighbors

st2ScmpRcvdOctets.name: st2ScmpRcvdOctets
st2ScmpRcvdOctets.description: Total octets of SCMP messages received

st2ScmpSentOctets.name: st2ScmpSentOctets
st2ScmpSentOctets.description: Total octets of SCMP messages sent

st2ScmpRcvdBadTypes.name: st2ScmpRcvdBadTypes
st2ScmpRcvdBadTypes.description: Count of SCMP messages received with bad type field

st2ScmpRcvdBadCks.name: st2ScmpRcvdBadCks
st2ScmpRcvdBadCks.description: Count of SCMP messages received with bad checksum

st2ScmpSentAccepts.name: st2ScmpSentAccepts
st2ScmpSentAccepts.description: Count of SCMP ACCEPT messages sent

st2ScmpSentAcks.name: st2ScmpSentAcks
st2ScmpSentAcks.description: Count of SCMP ACK messages sent

st2ScmpSentChanges.name: st2ScmpSentChanges
st2ScmpSentChanges.description: Count of SCMP CHANGE messages sent

st2ScmpSentChangeReqs.name: st2ScmpSentChangeReqs
st2ScmpSentChangeReqs.description: Count of SCMP CHANGE-REQUEST messages sent

st2ScmpSentConnects.name: st2ScmpSentConnects
st2ScmpSentConnects.description: Count of SCMP CONNECT messages sent

st2ScmpSentDisconnects.name: st2ScmpSentDisconnects
st2ScmpSentDisconnects.description: Count of SCMP DISCONNECT messages sent

st2ScmpSentErrorInReqs.name: st2ScmpSentErrorInReqs
st2ScmpSentErrorInReqs.description: Count of SCMP ERROR-IN-REQUEST messages sent

st2ScmpSentErrorInResps.name: st2ScmpSentErrorInResps
st2ScmpSentErrorInResps.description: Count of SCMP ERROR-IN-RESPONSE messages sent

st2ScmpSentHellos.name: st2ScmpSentHellos
st2ScmpSentHellos.description: Count of SCMP HELLO messages sent

st2ScmpSentHidApproves.name: st2ScmpSentHidApproves
st2ScmpSentHidApproves.description: Count of SCMP HID-APPROVE messages sent

st2ScmpSentHidChanges.name: st2ScmpSentHidChanges
st2ScmpSentHidChanges.description: Count of SCMP HID-CHANGE messages sent

st2ScmpSentHidChangeReqs.name: st2ScmpSentHidChangeReqs
st2ScmpSentHidChangeReqs.description: Count of SCMP HID-CHANGE-REQUEST messages sent

st2ScmpSentHidRejects.name: st2ScmpSentHidRejects
st2ScmpSentHidRejects.description: Count of SCMP HID-REJECT messages sent

st2ScmpSentNotifys.name: st2ScmpSentNotifys
st2ScmpSentNotifys.description: Count of SCMP NOTIFY messages sent

st2ScmpSentRefuses.name: st2ScmpSentRefuses
st2ScmpSentRefuses.description: Count of SCMP REFUSE messages sent

st2ScmpSentStatus.name: st2ScmpSentStatus
st2ScmpSentStatus.description: Count of SCMP STATUS messages sent

st2ScmpSentStatusResps.name: st2ScmpSentStatusResps
st2ScmpSentStatusResps.description: Count of SCMP STATUS-RESPONSE messages sent

st2ScmpRcvdAccepts.name: st2ScmpRcvdAccepts
st2ScmpRcvdAccepts.description: Count of SCMP ACCEPT messages received

st2ScmpRcvdAcks.name: st2ScmpRcvdAcks
st2ScmpRcvdAcks.description: Count of SCMP ACK messages received

st2ScmpRcvdChanges.name: st2ScmpRcvdChanges
st2ScmpRcvdChanges.description: Count of SCMP CHANGE messages received

st2ScmpRcvdChangeReqs.name: st2ScmpRcvdChangeReqs
st2ScmpRcvdChangeReqs.description: Count of SCMP CHANGE-REQUEST messages received

st2ScmpRcvdConnects.name: st2ScmpRcvdConnects
st2ScmpRcvdConnects.description: Count of SCMP CONNECT messages received

st2ScmpRcvdDisconnects.name: st2ScmpRcvdDisconnects
st2ScmpRcvdDisconnects.description: Count of SCMP DISCONNECT messages received

st2ScmpRcvdErrorInReqs.name: st2ScmpRcvdErrorInReqs
st2ScmpRcvdErrorInReqs.description: Count of SCMP ERROR-IN-REQUEST messages received

st2ScmpRcvdErrorInResps.name: st2ScmpRcvdErrorInResps
st2ScmpRcvdErrorInResps.description: Count of SCMP ERROR-IN-RESPONSE messages received

st2ScmpRcvdHellos.name: st2ScmpRcvdHellos
st2ScmpRcvdHellos.description: Count of SCMP HELLO messages received

st2ScmpRcvdHidApproves.name: st2ScmpRcvdHidApproves
st2ScmpRcvdHidApproves.description: Count of SCMP HID-APPROVE messages received

st2ScmpRcvdHidChanges.name: st2ScmpRcvdHidChanges
st2ScmpRcvdHidChanges.description: Count of SCMP HID-CHANGE messages received

st2ScmpRcvdHidChangeReqs.name: st2ScmpRcvdHidChangeReqs
st2ScmpRcvdHidChangeReqs.description: Count of SCMP HID-CHANGE-REQUEST messages received

st2ScmpRcvdHidRejects.name: st2ScmpRcvdHidRejects
st2ScmpRcvdHidRejects.description: Count of SCMP HID-REJECT messages received

st2ScmpRcvdNotifys.name: st2ScmpRcvdNotifys
st2ScmpRcvdNotifys.description: Count of SCMP NOTIFY messages received

st2ScmpRcvdRefuses.name: st2ScmpRcvdRefuses
st2ScmpRcvdRefuses.description: Count of SCMP REFUSE messages received

st2ScmpRcvdStatus.name: st2ScmpRcvdStatus
st2ScmpRcvdStatus.description: Count of SCMP STATUS messages received

st2ScmpRcvdStatusResps.name: st2ScmpRcvdStatusResps
st2ScmpRcvdStatusResps.description: Count of SCMP STATUS-RESPONSE messages received

st2ScmpRcvdErrorSnap.name: st2ScmpRcvdErrorSnap
st2ScmpRcvdErrorSnap.description: Contents from last SCMP packet received with error

st2ScmpRcvdBadTypeTime.name: st2ScmpRcvdBadTypeTime
st2ScmpRcvdBadTypeTime.description: Time that last SCMP packet was received with bad Type field

st2ScmpRcvdBadCksTime.name: st2ScmpRcvdBadCksTime
st2ScmpRcvdBadCksTime.description: Time that last SCMP packet was received with bad checksum

st2OriginOpens.name: st2OriginOpens
st2OriginOpens.description: Count of streams opened with this agent as origin, but they may have since been closed

st2IntermedOpens.name: st2IntermedOpens
st2IntermedOpens.description: Count of streams opened with this agent as intermediate system

st2TargetOpens.name: st2TargetOpens
st2TargetOpens.description: Count of streams opened with this agent as target (destination) - may also be counted in intermediate

st2FailOpens.name: st2FailOpens
st2FailOpens.description: Count of stream opens attempted which did not complete

st2AcceptTimeouts.name: st2AcceptTimeouts
st2AcceptTimeouts.description: Count of stream opens failed because ACCEPT did not get acknowledged

st2ParamChangeFails.name: st2ParamChangeFails
st2ParamChangeFails.description: Count of stream parameter changes which failed

st2NumStreamEntries.name: st2NumStreamEntries
st2NumStreamEntries.description: Count of stream table entries (extent of streams table)

st2NumOpenStreams.name: st2NumOpenStreams
st2NumOpenStreams.description: Count of streams which are open (number of table entries for them)

st2NumOpenOriginStreams.name: st2NumOpenOriginStreams
st2NumOpenOriginStreams.description: Count of current open streams which were originated here

st2NumHops.name: st2NumHops
st2NumHops.description: Count of Hop entries (extent of next-hop table)

st2NumNeighbors.name: st2NumNeighbors
st2NumNeighbors.description: Count of Neighbor entries (extent of neighbor table)

st2NumTargets.name: st2NumTargets
st2NumTargets.description: Count of target entries (extent of target table)

st2NumGroups.name: st2NumGroups
st2NumGroups.description: count of group entries (extent of groups table)

st2NumSubgroups.name: st2NumSubgroups
st2NumSubgroups.description: Count of subgroup entries (extent of subgroups table)

st2RouteFailures.name: st2RouteFailures
st2RouteFailures.description: Count of stream opens failed because no route found

st2RouteLoops.name: st2RouteLoops
st2RouteLoops.description: Count of stream opens failed because route inconsistency found, e.g. potential or actual loop

st2ScmpRetrans.name: st2ScmpRetrans
st2ScmpRetrans.description: count of SCMP control timeout and retransmissions

st2StreamTable.name: st2StreamTable
st2StreamTable.description: table of information for each stream

st2StreamName.name: st2StreamName
st2StreamName.description: internal format name of this stream

st2StreamPrevHopAddr.name: st2StreamPrevHopAddr
st2StreamPrevHopAddr.description: previous hop entry which feeds data to this node

st2StreamPrevHopVlid.name: st2StreamPrevHopVlid
st2StreamPrevHopVlid.description: virtual link identifier of the previous hop

st2StreamStartTime.name: st2StreamStartTime
st2StreamStartTime.description: timestamp when this stream was first entered in this table

st2StreamState.name: st2StreamState
st2StreamState.description: current state of this stream at this node

st2StreamStateTime.name: st2StreamStateTime
st2StreamStateTime.description: time this stream entered its current state

st2StreamRole.name: st2StreamRole
st2StreamRole.description: role that this agent performs for this stream

st2StreamGroup.name: st2StreamGroup
st2StreamGroup.description: group (if any) which this stream is in

st2StreamNumSubgroups.name: st2StreamNumSubgroups
st2StreamNumSubgroups.description: number of subgroups which this stream is in (get info from subgroup table)

st2StreamNumNextHops.name: st2StreamNumNextHops
st2StreamNumNextHops.description: number of nexthops to which this stream feeds data (get info from hop table)

st2StreamNumTargets.name: st2StreamNumTargets
st2StreamNumTargets.description: number of targets to which this stream feeds data (get info from target table)

st2StreamRefuses.name: st2StreamRefuses
st2StreamRefuses.description: number of times this stream has suffered the ignominy of getting changes refused

st2StreamFlowspecChanges.name: st2StreamFlowspecChanges
st2StreamFlowspecChanges.description: number of times this flowspec has been changed over the duration of this stream.

st2StreamFlowPrecedence.name: st2StreamFlowPrecedence
st2StreamFlowPrecedence.description: flowspec precedence field (8 bits) -- NOTE: THIS MOVES DOWN BELOW ERROR RATE

st2StreamFlowLimitOnCost.name: st2StreamFlowLimitOnCost
st2StreamFlowLimitOnCost.description: flowspec limit on cost field (16 bits)

st2StreamFlowLimitOnDelay.name: st2StreamFlowLimitOnDelay
st2StreamFlowLimitOnDelay.description: flowspec limit on delay field (16 bits)

st2StreamFlowLimitOnPduBytes.name: st2StreamFlowLimitOnPduBytes
st2StreamFlowLimitOnPduBytes.description: flowspec LIMIT ON PDU BYTES (pdu size in octets) field (16 bits)

st2StreamFlowLimitOnPduRate.name: st2StreamFlowLimitOnPduRate
st2StreamFlowLimitOnPduRate.description: flowspec limit on pdu rate field (16 bits)

st2StreamFlowMinBytesXRate.name: st2StreamFlowMinBytesXRate
st2StreamFlowMinBytesXRate.description: flowspec min bytes x rate field (product gives bandwidth in bytes per 10 seconds; divide by 1250 for Kbits per second) (32 bits)

st2StreamFlowMeanDelay.name: st2StreamFlowMeanDelay
st2StreamFlowMeanDelay.description: flowspec accumulated mean delay field (32 bits)

st2StreamFlowDelayVariance.name: st2StreamFlowDelayVariance
st2StreamFlowDelayVariance.description: flowspec accumulated delay variance field (32 bits)

st2StreamFlowDesPduBytes.name: st2StreamFlowDesPduBytes
st2StreamFlowDesPduBytes.description: flowspec desired pdu bytes (size) field (16 bits)

st2StreamFlowDesPduRate.name: st2StreamFlowDesPduRate
st2StreamFlowDesPduRate.description: flowspec desired pdu rate field (16 bits)

st2StreamOptionPtp.name: st2StreamOptionPtp
st2StreamOptionPtp.description: true if POINT TO POINT option specified on this stream

st2StreamOptionFdx.name: st2StreamOptionFdx
st2StreamOptionFdx.description: true if FULL DUPLEX option specified on this stream; reverse stream is the same but takes a separate stream table entry in this MIB

st2StreamOptionRecover.name: st2StreamOptionRecover
st2StreamOptionRecover.description: false if NO RECOVERY option specified for this stream

st2StreamOptionReverseCharge.name: st2StreamOptionReverseCharge
st2StreamOptionReverseCharge.description: true if REVERSE CHARGE option specified for this stream

st2StreamOptionTimestamp.name: st2StreamOptionTimestamp
st2StreamOptionTimestamp.description: the TIMESTAMP option specified for this stream

st2HopTable.name: st2HopTable
st2HopTable.description: table of information for each prev- or next-hop

st2HopHid.name: st2HopHid
st2HopHid.description: HID which this node has negotiated with this next hop (and all others on a multicast)

st2HopMyVlid.name: st2HopMyVlid
st2HopMyVlid.description: VLID (table index or something) by which this next hop addresses me

st2HopYourVlid.name: st2HopYourVlid
st2HopYourVlid.description: VLID (table index or something) by which I address this next hop

st2HopState.name: st2HopState
st2HopState.description: state of negotiation for this stream to this hop

st2HopNumTargets.name: st2HopNumTargets
st2HopNumTargets.description: number of targets reached via this next hop

st2HopMcastAddr.name: st2HopMcastAddr
st2HopMcastAddr.description: multicast address, if any, used to reach this hop and others on same net (for current ST-II, this does not work here)(this should be an IP multicast address, or some magic IP address which translates into local-net multicast

st2HopErrorCode.name: st2HopErrorCode
st2HopErrorCode.description: refuse code or other error indicator received from next hop

st2HopDetectorAddr.name: st2HopDetectorAddr
st2HopDetectorAddr.description: detector address field from error message received from next hop

st2HopNeighborAddr.name: st2HopNeighborAddr
st2HopNeighborAddr.description: ip address of neighbor which is this next hop (it has the info rfc1190 to all next hops for streams which go through that node)

st2HopStreamName.name: st2HopStreamName
st2HopStreamName.description: back pointer to stream for which this is a hop

st2HopPkts.name: st2HopPkts
st2HopPkts.description: count of packets received from this hop in this stream, or sent in this stream to this hop, depending on st2HopRole

st2HopOctets.name: st2HopOctets
st2HopOctets.description: count of octets received from this hop in this stream, or sent in this stream to this hop, depending on st2HopRole

st2HopDiscards.name: st2HopDiscards
st2HopDiscards.description: count of packets received from this hop in this stream and not processed, or not able to be sent in this stream to this hop, depending on st2HopRole

st2HopIpEncap.name: st2HopIpEncap
st2HopIpEncap.description: true if data for this stream is sent with IP encapsulation to this next hop

st2HopIpAddr.name: st2HopIpAddr
st2HopIpAddr.description: if ip encapsulation is on, this is the direct (local) next hop IP address of the next router on the path. the ST agent next hop can be further away. Implementations might store this so as to bypass the IP routing function.

st2HopRole.name: st2HopRole
st2HopRole.description: tells whether this hop entry is a previous-hop for this stream or a next-hop. this is to help identify whether the packet, octet and discard counters are for input from a prev-hop or output to a next-hop.

st2HopErrorTime.name: st2HopErrorTime
st2HopErrorTime.description: Time when refuse code or other error occurs

st2NeighborTable.name: st2NeighborTable
st2NeighborTable.description: table of information for each neighbor common info

st2NeighborAddr.name: st2NeighborAddr
st2NeighborAddr.description: address of neighbor ST Agent serving as nexthop or previous hop for one or more streams

st2NeighborState.name: st2NeighborState
st2NeighborState.description: state of neighbor ST Agent w.r.t. hellos and data

st2NeighborStateTime.name: st2NeighborStateTime
st2NeighborStateTime.description: time entered this state of neighbor ST Agent

st2NeighborNumHops.name: st2NeighborNumHops
st2NeighborNumHops.description: number of hops using this neighbor for next or prev

st2NeighborHelloTimer.name: st2NeighborHelloTimer
st2NeighborHelloTimer.description: min of hello times based on RecoveryTimeout for all streams via this neighbor - or possibly default. Note: ST specifies this in milliseconds

st2NeighborHelloRcvdTime.name: st2NeighborHelloRcvdTime
st2NeighborHelloRcvdTime.description: timestamp when most recent hello received from this neighbor

st2NeighborDataRcvdTime.name: st2NeighborDataRcvdTime
st2NeighborDataRcvdTime.description: timestamp when most recent ST data received from this neighbor - this may be updated infrequently, perhaps every couple of seconds

st2NeighborAckRequested.name: st2NeighborAckRequested
st2NeighborAckRequested.description: I have requested an ACK from this neighbor, still outstanding - for RTT estimation

st2NeighborRestarted.name: st2NeighborRestarted
st2NeighborRestarted.description: hello received from this neighbor with the restart bit on indicating neighbor has restarted recently

st2NeighborSentHellos.name: st2NeighborSentHellos
st2NeighborSentHellos.description: count of hellos sent to this neighbor

st2NeighborRcvdHellos.name: st2NeighborRcvdHellos
st2NeighborRcvdHellos.description: count of hellos received from this neighbor

st2NeighborMissedHellos.name: st2NeighborMissedHellos
st2NeighborMissedHellos.description: count of hellos expected which were not received from this neighbor

st2NeighborRoundTripTime.name: st2NeighborRoundTripTime
st2NeighborRoundTripTime.description: current estimate of round trip time to this neighbor based on hello exchanges

st2NeighborInterfaceIdx.name: st2NeighborInterfaceIdx
st2NeighborInterfaceIdx.description: internal index of interface which reaches this neighbor

st2NeighborStBadMsgs.name: st2NeighborStBadMsgs
st2NeighborStBadMsgs.description: count of bad stream data messages received from this neighbor

st2NeighborScmpBadMsgs.name: st2NeighborScmpBadMsgs
st2NeighborScmpBadMsgs.description: count of bad stream control messages received from this neighbor

st2TargetTable.name: st2TargetTable
st2TargetTable.description: table of information for each target

st2TargetHop.name: st2TargetHop
st2TargetHop.description: ip address of the nexthop which gets to this target

st2TargetStreamName.name: st2TargetStreamName
st2TargetStreamName.description: name of the stream this target is a member of

st2GroupTable.name: st2GroupTable
st2GroupTable.description: table of information for each group

st2GroupName.name: st2GroupName
st2GroupName.description: the ST-II name of this group of streams

st2GroupNumStreams.name: st2GroupNumStreams
st2GroupNumStreams.description: number of streams which are members of this group

st2GroupNumSubgroups.name: st2GroupNumSubgroups
st2GroupNumSubgroups.description: number of subgroups in this group

st2SubgroupTable.name: st2SubgroupTable
st2SubgroupTable.description: table of information for each sub-group

st2SubgroupGroup.name: st2SubgroupGroup
st2SubgroupGroup.description: group which this subgroup is a member

st2SubgroupNumStreams.name: st2SubgroupNumStreams
st2SubgroupNumStreams.description: number of streams in this subgroup

st2InterfaceTable.name: st2InterfaceTable
st2InterfaceTable.description: table of information for each interface

st2InterfaceIndex.name: st2InterfaceIndex
st2InterfaceIndex.description: interface index of this interface - like ifIndex from main MIB

st2InterfaceNumInStreams.name: st2InterfaceNumInStreams
st2InterfaceNumInStreams.description: number of streams coming in this interface

st2InterfaceNumOutStreams.name: st2InterfaceNumOutStreams
st2InterfaceNumOutStreams.description: number of streams going out this interface

st2InterfaceNumNeighbors.name: st2InterfaceNumNeighbors
st2InterfaceNumNeighbors.description: number of neighbors on this interface being used as prev or next hop

st2InterfaceInBwReserved.name: st2InterfaceInBwReserved
st2InterfaceInBwReserved.description: total of flowspec (bytes x rate) into this interface in units of bits-per-second

st2InterfaceInBwReservable.name: st2InterfaceInBwReservable
st2InterfaceInBwReservable.description: amount of bandwidth remaining able to be reserved for input into this interface in units of bits-per-second

st2InterfaceOutBwReserved.name: st2InterfaceOutBwReserved
st2InterfaceOutBwReserved.description: total of flowspec (bytes x rate) out of this interface in units of bits-per-second

st2InterfaceOutBwReservable.name: st2InterfaceOutBwReservable
st2InterfaceOutBwReservable.description: amount of bandwidth remaining able to be reserved for output out of this interface in units of bits-per-second

st2InterfaceTotRcvdPkts.name: st2InterfaceTotRcvdPkts
st2InterfaceTotRcvdPkts.description: Count of stream data packets received overall (for streams both current and expired)

st2InterfaceTotSentPkts.name: st2InterfaceTotSentPkts
st2InterfaceTotSentPkts.description: Count of stream data packets sent overall (??) including replications for multiple output interfaces and multiple next-hops when multicast is not used ( make this per interface ??)

st2InterfaceTotRcvdOctets.name: st2InterfaceTotRcvdOctets
st2InterfaceTotRcvdOctets.description: Count of stream data octets received overall

st2InterfaceTotSentOctets.name: st2InterfaceTotSentOctets
st2InterfaceTotSentOctets.description: Count of stream data octets sent

st2InterfaceRcvdHdrErrors.name: st2InterfaceRcvdHdrErrors
st2InterfaceRcvdHdrErrors.description: Count of stream data packets received with header format errors

st2InterfaceRcvdHidErrors.name: st2InterfaceRcvdHidErrors
st2InterfaceRcvdHidErrors.description: Count of stream data packets received with errors in HID

st2InterfaceRcvdLenErrors.name: st2InterfaceRcvdLenErrors
st2InterfaceRcvdLenErrors.description: Count of stream data packets received with errors in length

st2InterfaceRcvdHdrErrorTime.name: st2InterfaceRcvdHdrErrorTime
st2InterfaceRcvdHdrErrorTime.description: Time of last stream data packet received with header format errors

st2InterfaceRcvdHidErrorTime.name: st2InterfaceRcvdHidErrorTime
st2InterfaceRcvdHidErrorTime.description: Time of last stream data packet received with errors in HID

st2InterfaceRcvdLenErrorTime.name: st2InterfaceRcvdLenErrorTime
st2InterfaceRcvdLenErrorTime.description: Time of last stream data packet received with errors in length

st2InterfaceRcvdErrorSnap.name: st2InterfaceRcvdErrorSnap
st2InterfaceRcvdErrorSnap.description: Contents from last stream data packet received with error

st2InterfaceRcvdPktDrops.name: st2InterfaceRcvdPktDrops
st2InterfaceRcvdPktDrops.description: Count of stream data packets received and dropped due to resource limitations

st2InterfaceSentPktDrops.name: st2InterfaceSentPktDrops
st2InterfaceSentPktDrops.description: Count of stream data packets sent and dropped due to resource limitations

st2LastClosePrevHopIpAddr.name: st2LastClosePrevHopIpAddr
st2LastClosePrevHopIpAddr.description: Last close previous hop Ip address

st2LastCloseReasonCode.name: st2LastCloseReasonCode
st2LastCloseReasonCode.description: Reason code field from the last close message

st2LastCloseDetectorIpAddress.name: st2LastCloseDetectorIpAddress
st2LastCloseDetectorIpAddress.description: detector address from the last close message

st2LastCloseTime.name: st2LastCloseTime
st2LastCloseTime.description: sysuptime when the last close received
